nodes.documentation:
@notice A factory to deploy new Hackathon contracts, and provide functionality to retrieve the deployed contracts' addresses.
@dev TODO: use struct to keep record of hackathon names, and allow implementing upgradability.
nodes.name: HackathonFactory

nodes.documentation: @dev emitted when a new Hackathon contract is deployed.
nodes.name: NewHackathonContract

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to check if hackathon name is not empty.
nodes.name: notEmptyName

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to check if hackathon name is unique.
nodes.name: uniqueHackathonName
createHackathonContract

nodes.documentation:
@notice Get a list with the addresses of the deployed contracts.
@return List of deployed contract's addresses
nodes.name: getDeployedHackathonContracts

nodes.documentation:
@notice Get a contract address with the internal id.
@return An address representing a deployed contract
nodes.name: getHackathonContractById

nodes.documentation:
@notice Get a contract address with the internal name.
@return An address representing a deployed contract
nodes.name: getHackathonContractByName

params.description: A short description for the Hackathon.
params.name: Unique hackathon's name.

getHackathonContractById(uint256).return: An address representing a deployed contract

getHackathonContractByName(bytes32).return: An address representing a deployed contract

createHackathonContract(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Creates and deploys a new Hackathon contract.

getDeployedHackathonContracts().notice: Get a list with the addresses of the deployed contracts.

getHackathonContractById(uint256).notice: Get a contract address with the internal id.

getHackathonContractByName(bytes32).notice: Get a contract address with the internal name.

userdoc.notice: A factory to deploy new Hackathon contracts, and provide functionality to retrieve the deployed contracts' addresses.
